#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	long long a,b,c,carry=0;
	cin>>a>>b;
	while(a || b)
	{
		c=a+b;
		b=(a>b)?a:b;
		carry=0;
		while(b)
		{
			if(b%10>(c%10))
				carry++;
			b/=10;
			c/=10;
		}
		if(carry==0)
			cout<<"No carry operation."<<endl;
		if(carry==1)
			cout<<carry<<" carry operation."<<endl;
		if(carry>1)
			cout<<carry<<" carry operations."<<endl;
		cin>>a>>b;
	}
	return 0;
}
